Having spent many years on the African continent I can assure you that 
cannibalism is a well-accepted practice, especially among those who 
practice voodoo – snake worship. The “Jap” may have eaten human flesh but 
in Japan as elsewhere the practice is against the law and contrary to all 
social norms. In Africa and Haiti it is still practiced by many 
full-blooded Negroes. SO STOP MAKING EXCUSES FOR BLACKS – IT IS IN THEIR 
NATURE!!!﻿

And he said cannibalism is a well-accepted pratice in Africa. Lol he 
obviously doesnt know what hes talking about. He thinks today is 200 bc

Did he say he holds a Phd? Lol I didnt read all of his shit. It is just an 
another keyboard warrior man.

+GodMelo Anthony There is a contradiction in the above. "...in Africa 
cannibalism is a well accepted practice... , "especially among those who 
practice voodoo- snake worship." Who practices voodoo and snake worship??? 
Voodoo maybe practiced in some parts of west Africa and the Caribbean and 
is a growing practice in the west among caucasians. As for snake worship, 
ill have to google that in a few seconds so I know what we are talking 
about. I wouldn't even know where I might find a voodoo practitioner unless 
you are using it to encompass all forms of traditional beliefs and 
animism. Most Africans are either Muslim or Christian though some might 
practice forms of animism concurrently. For someone like Golda Miher who 
says he holds a PHD, I am surprised that he should just blurt things out 
without thinking of what he saying, unless he so overcome by emotions 
(racial) when he is writing that he is unable to think critically about 
what is being said.

You're dumb. Japanese dont eat human flesh. There may be several 
cannibalism cases that were commited by Japanese such as Issei Sagawa, but 
other than that they do not. Oh yeah and they do not eat dogs or cats 
either. I have lived in asia for a while so I know. What people think here 
about asia is purely misconceptional.

Cannibalism Secrets Revealed Documentary HQ
White demon lol seam you can't take the truth that africa is a shit hole!
Shut up, you old white demon.

You sound like a communist or perhaps a cultural-marxist. I deal with 
facts, and the facts are crystal clear. Africa is a continent still in 
chaos - both political and social. The African civilizations you refer to 
are mere figments of your deluded imagination. They did not exist in the 
form you claim. You offer no explanation for the current predicament of 
Haiti, Liberia, Nigeria, Rhodesia and South Africa. Many other countries on 
the African continent exist as they did before Europeans arrived – desolate 
and tribal. Your continent is a sink hole of foreign aid – trillions of 
dollars from the west. And what do you do with this money – absolutely 
nothing. I could write book about Africa and its problems – but it would no 
fit into the current narrative of political correctness. 

It is really not about geography but the differences in the inherent 
biological and genetic character of Congoids against that of my people – 
Indo-European people. The achievements of Indo-Europeans go back thousands 
of years, and you can see their achievements in the ancient world – Rome, 
Greece, Northern India, Egypt and throughout the whole of Europe and the 
world. And you can see some of their modern achievements on the surface of 
the moon. No other people on the surface of the earth have produced the 
literary, technological and scientific achievements that Indo-Europeans and 
their descendants have produced. This is a fact an educated man should not 
dispute. 

I personally do not care about Africa or its problems. It is your continent 
not ours. Just start doing something with it and stop asking us in the west 
to solve your problems. It is possible to build a great civilization there 
– you have everything that is needed in terms of natural resources.

+GOLDA MIHER African's were ruling themselves in centralised Kingdoms which 
were well organised socially, people had enough to eat, and there was 
harmony in society, law and order. Even the tribes that were led by elders 
had very efficient ways of solving disputes. Common law was imposed on us 
but was not a necessity. Law is not something that was introduced by 
outsiders. You are attempting to make a connection between industrial 
development and social order.

The scramble for Africa resulted in the creation of abstract entities 
(countries) to which the new members bare little or no allegiance even half 
a century since independence and this is where a big part of them problem 
stems from. The other is that Africa never really became independent. 
African leadership and politics is influenced by the West: who gets to 
become president, how we use our resources. The only way we could avert 
that is by closing our countries to the rest of the world like China did 
under Mao Zedong, I don't know if that would be the best solution. Our 
Presidents are essentially proxy colonial administrators which is quite 
evident in the way they abase themselves towards their former colonial 
masters and export public funds to banks in Western countries.

An example of Western meddling gone wrong, is Idi Amin (President 
1971-1979) who was a soldier in the Kings African rifles and when the 
British put in power with the hope that he would be easy to control, 
influence and maintain their influence. He ended up killing more than 
500,000 Ugandans, joining terrorist Arab organisations and facilitating the 
hijacking of an Air France with 248 passengers and Netanyahu's elder 
brother Yonatan was killed. 

So first of all, there is no experiment! We were not dropped onto the 
African continent as some extra-terrestrial species. We have been in Africa 
and lived in harmony. What you are referring to as experiments(Liberia), 
are just more examples of the West interfering in Africa's affairs.

If by progress you mean our ability to adopt Western philosophies and 
Capitalism then you may be right. But that is more about ideology and is 
not an indicator of happiness.

Moreover, you forget that homo-sapiens have been in existence for more than 
50,000 years (behavioural modernity) at which time your ancestors were all 
black. Its ironic that if our eyes had not evolved to interpret the 
ultraviolet spectrum as it did, we would not be having this discussion. 
Alternatively if the physical conditions had been different, you might 
appear black and I white. 
http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/
http://www.livescience.com/42838-european-hunter-gatherer-genome-sequenced.html
http://www.counterpunch.org/2014/02/07/where-did-white-people-come-from/
http://www.futurity.org/light-skin-mutation-stems-one-ancestor/
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-2535288/Light-skin-colour-Europeans-stems-ONE-ancestor-lived-India-Middle-East-10-000-years-ago.html
When the Romans around 290 BC, how long had these European entities 
(Kingdoms) existed? Might the Romans have said of some of them that they 
were Cannibals and practiced human sacrifice? Were not many of them living 
in forests and lawless?

Africa's countries are barely a hundred years old. Uganda is about 50 years 
old. Britain is at least 900 years if we start with William the conqueror. 
That is a significant difference in time which is a critical factor for any 
kind of development even the one on which you are basing your argument.

Everything is relative. Relative to time, relative to ones definition of 
progress and development. Just because African countries were not 
industrialised, and selfishness was not the basis of our motivations, does 
not mean we were not happy, content and living in peace and sustainable 
harmony with our environment.

In the case of Haiti, Zimbabwe and South Africa he inherited a ready-made 
country. Here were lands sown with prosperity, lands of wood, water, 
agriculture, towns, cities and plantations, and in the midst of it the 
Black Man was turned loose to work out his own salvation.

What progress has he made? ABSOLUTELY NONE!!!

The answer has been working itself out in these black nations in flesh and 
blood. The Negro has had his chance, a fair field and no favour. He has had 
the most fertile and beautiful lands of Haiti, Zimbabwe, Liberia and South 
Africa for his own. He has had the advantage of excellent European and 
American laws.

Can the Negro rule himself, and by Negro I mean the full-blooded African, 
not the man of mixed race, or the white throw-back who has inherited a dash 
of the tar-brush. We need to look at those countries under black rule.

The present condition of Haiti, Zimbabwe, Liberia, South Africa, and the 
whole African continent, gives the best possible answer to the question and 
considering the experiment has lasted for over 200 years in the case of 
Haiti and Liberia, perhaps also a conclusive one.

I have plenty of evidence, including photos and videos about Africa. You 
know that the controlled media is not your best source of truthful 
information. Tourism does not count either. There are many things in Uganda 
that are not on the tourist circuit – I know because I have contacts in the 
tourist industry and certain areas in Africa and indeed Uganda are no go 
zones.  

But cannibalism is the least of Africa’s problems. The real question is 
there any hope for the Negro in Africa or elsewhere?

+GOLDA MIHER Incidentally, I happen to be African, Ugandan in particular, 
and I consider myself fairly well travelled even on the African continent. 
I have never visited a single African country and had to worry that I might 
encounter a Cannibal.

Its unfortunate that you seem to have been in the wrong company when 
you were on the continent. I would be surprised if you have visited 5 
countries out of the 53, and even if you had, there is no way, you can say 
that cannibalism is condoned in all or even one of them. There is also no 
documentary evidence you can show for your allegations.

Yes there are a few bright blacks, but again any contribution they could 
possibly make to a civilized black society is diluted by the problems 
created by the average black. This is why nations ruled by blacks are 
political and social sewers. The history of societies ruled by blacks is 
one of chaos, indolence, superstition and violence. And that is why blacks 
seek asylum in the so-called racist west.

South Africa faces the same problems that plague all nations ruled by 
blacks – on the African continent and elsewhere in places like Haiti and 
the USA. It is a biological problem that no one wants to talk about because 
they do not want to be called a racist. The average IQ of a sub-Saharan 
black is 80. Thus the average black – the numerical majority - does not 
possess the intellectual capacity to make any meaningful contributions to a 
progressive society.

I will first need to educate you with some facts.

In 1840 the Black King Grazier said: “The slave trade is the ruling 
principle of my people. It is the source and glory of all their wealth. The 
mother lulls the child to sleep with notes of triumph over an enemy reduced 
to slavery.”

So slavery for economic reasons rather than racist reasons has always been 
a part of Africa and indeed the world throughout human history. 

It was however white people who put an end to the practice.

I said Africa is a continent. Countries on the African continent I lived in 
as part of my work: Liberia, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, Guinea, Ghana, Congo, 
Rwanda, Namibia, Rhodesia and South Africa. And every country was in 
economic and social chaos, despite being blessed with abundant natural 
resources. Voodoo – snake worship was very, very common and is now growing 
in importance again in South Africa. I have witnessed it all – whatever you 
can imagine I have seen – beatings, killings, necklacing!!

Ουγκάντα: Συνέντευξη με έναν κανίβαλο [Βίντεο]



Κατά το τελευταίο έτος, έχουν υπάρξει αυξανόμενες αναφορές για κανιβαλισμό 
στην Ουγκάντα. Σχετικά περιστατικά έχουν καταγραφεί τουλάχιστον από το 2011.

Η Vocativ έστειλε τον Αμερικανό σκηνοθέτη Μάθιου Γκολντμαν στην χώρα για να 
μιλήσει ο ίδιος με τους ανθρώπους που εφαρμόζουν αυτή την αποτρόπαια 
πρακτική.


Στην Ουγκάντα ο Γκόλντμαν συναντήθηκε με τον Baboola, έναν κανίβαλο, ο 
οποίος του μίλησε για την κατάσταση στην Ουγκάντα και γιατί τρώει ανθρώπινη 
σάρκα.

Όπως αναφέρει και το Βusiness Ιnsider ο κανιβαλισμός έχει σημειώσει άνοδο 
στη χώρα τα τελευταία χρόνια. Μια έγκυος γυναίκα και το παιδί της 
σκοτώθηκαν και φαγώθηκαν στο Ρακάι, μια συνοικία στην πρωτεύουσα της 
Ουγκάντας Κιγκάλι, τον Μάρτιο, ενώ 14 άνθρωποι έχουν συλληφθεί για το 
περιστατικό.

Η κυβέρνηση της Ουγκάντα έχει τηρήσει αυστηρή απαγόρευση κυκλοφορίας τη 
νύχτα για την αποφυγή τέτοιων περιστατικών και κατά τους τελευταίους μήνες, 
οι άνθρωποι έχουν καταστρέψει τα σπίτια και τις επιχειρήσεις των υπόπτων 
για κανιβαλισμό.

Ακόμη και ο Τζόζεφ Κόνι ηγέτης του πολύ-δυσφημισμένου Στρατού Αντίστασης 
του Κυρίου, έχει κατηγορηθεί για κανιβαλισμό. Υπήρξαν αναφορές ότι 
υποχρεώνει τους στρατιώτες του να πίνουν το αίμα των εχθρών.

Ο Baboola είπε στον Γκολντμαν ότι μυήθηκε στον κανιβαλισμό από έναν 
συγγενή, ο οποίος του είπε το κρέας ήταν «καλό» και ότι έπρεπε να το φάει.

Ο ίδιος επεσήμανε ότι τρώει μόνο ανθρώπους που είναι ήδη νεκροί και δε τους 
σκοτώνει, ωστόσο εξηγεί τα περιστατικά δολοφονίας με το γεγονός ότι πολλοί 
υποστηρίζουν ότι είναι καλύτερα να τους τρώνε όταν έχουν μόλις πεθάνει.

In March 2001 in Germany, Armin Meiwes posted an Internet ad seeking a 
young man willing to be slaughtered and eaten. The ad was answered by Bernd 
Jürgen Brandes. Meiwes stabbed Brandes in the neck with a kitchen knife, 
kissing him first, then chopped him up into several pieces. He placed 
several pieces of Brandes in the freezer. Over the next few weeks, Meiwes 
defrosted and cooked parts of Brandes in olive oil and garlic and 
eventually consumed 20 kg of human flesh. Meiwes was convicted of 
manslaughter in 2004.[40] A retrial in 2006 found Meiwes guilty of murder, 
and sentenced him to life imprisonment.[41] The songs "Mein Teil" by 
Rammstein and "Eaten" by Bloodbath are based on this case.

On September 14, 2007, a man named Özgür Dengiz was captured in Ankara, the 
Turkish capital, after killing and eating a man. After cutting slices of 
flesh from his victim's body, Dengiz distributed the rest to stray dogs on 
the street, according to his own testimony. He ate some of the man's flesh 
raw on his way home. Dengiz, who lived with his parents, arrived at the 
family house and placed the remaining parts of the body in the fridge 
without saying a word to his parents.[

On November 14, 2009, three homeless men in Perm, Russia were arrested for 
killing and eating the parts of a 25 year-old male victim. The remaining 
body parts were then sold to a local pie and kebab house.[

Dennis Storm and Valerio Zeno, the two presenters of the Dutch TV show 
Proefkonijnen, ate each other's flesh on air in December 2011. They were 
filmed having a piece of their muscle tissue surgically removed, which was 
then fried and eaten in front of a studio audience

n April 2011, in the town of Darya Khan, Punjab, Pakistan, brothers Arif 
Ali and Farman Ali were arrested for eating a human corpse stolen from a 
grave. They were cooking body parts for a meal when arrested; the police 
also recovered remains of human body parts from their house.[59] The 
brothers were released from jail in 2013; however, in April 2014, they were 
once again discovered to be making curry out of a human corpse (this time, 
the body of a two- to three-year-old child), presumed to have been stolen 
from a graveyard.
